items.name: Benue River Art Promenade
items.short_description: Stroll along the newly developed riverfront featuring contemporary art installations, local sculptures, and scenic views of the Benue River. It's a perfect spot for an evening walk or a family outing.
items.address: Along Numan Road, Jimeta, Yola North

items.name: Yola Spice Market & Culinary Hub
items.short_description: Experience the vibrant flavors of Adamawa at this modern market dedicated to local spices, fresh produce, and a food court offering traditional Nigerian dishes and cooking classes. A must-visit for food enthusiasts.
items.address: Opposite Modibbo Adama University Teaching Hospital, Jimeta

items.name: Adamawa Digital Innovation Lab
items.short_description: A cutting-edge co-working space and tech incubation center fostering innovation and digital skills among Yola's youth. Visitors can attend workshops, network, or simply enjoy the modern cafe.
items.address: No. 12 Kashim Ibrahim Way, Yola Town

items.name: Gongola Heritage Center
items.short_description: Delve into the rich history and cultural legacy of the former Gongola State at this interactive museum. Featuring artifacts, exhibits, and oral histories, it offers a deep dive into the region's diverse heritage.

items.name: Sunset Eco Park
items.short_description: A tranquil green oasis designed for relaxation and outdoor activities, featuring walking trails, picnic spots, and a dedicated children's play area. Catch breathtaking sunsets over the Yola landscape.
items.address: Off Federal University of Technology Road, Girei

items.name: The Oasis Food Court & Arcade
items.short_description: Yola's newest entertainment hub, offering a wide array of local and international cuisines in a vibrant food court setting, coupled with a modern arcade for all ages. Perfect for a fun evening out.
items.address: Grand Millennium Mall, Hospital Road, Jimeta

items.name: Yola Craft Village
items.short_description: Showcasing the incredible talent of local artisans, this village is a vibrant marketplace for traditional crafts, textiles, pottery, and jewelry. Support local talent and find unique souvenirs.
items.address: Adjacent to Lamido's Palace, Yola Old Town

items.name: Sardauna Sports Complex
items.short_description: A state-of-the-art multi-sport facility offering pitches for football, basketball courts, and a modern gymnasium. Open to the public for sports, fitness classes, and community events.
items.address: Off Numan Road, Opposite State Secretariat, Yola

items.name: The Yola Storytelling Cafe
items.short_description: A cozy and inviting cafe that doubles as a cultural hub, hosting regular storytelling sessions, poetry readings, and live acoustic music. Enjoy great coffee and connect with Yola's creative scene.
items.address: Along Airport Road, Opposite Yola International Airport

items.name: Mambilla Peak Indoor Climbing
items.short_description: Conquer new heights at Yola's first indoor climbing gym, offering challenges for all skill levels from beginners to experienced climbers. A thrilling way to stay fit and active.
items.address: 2nd Floor, Grandview Plaza, Barracks Road, Jimeta
